scenario_text.value: Urgh... I can’t keep this up much longer...
Miyuki! Could you at least close the door?!

I’m sorry, I can’t! Please, just hang in
there a little longer!

I don’t know if we can! If the door stays
open like this...

Is that...light? It’s coming from the other
side of the door!
Hey, you know this video?

Oh, yeah! I saw that one. It looks so real,
doesn’t it?
You think maybe this actually happened?

Haha, no way! But it’d be pretty cool if it
did.

What is all this? These voices... These
sounds... What’s happening?!
So cool! Come on, you can do it!

Nah, this has gotta be a fake, I don’t care
how real it looks.
What... What is happening?!
(Yeah, seriously... What’s going on?)
Wah?! Huh? I got a text?

Oh hey, it’s from a friend of mine from
school. Looks like a link to a video site.
Wait, I remember this!

(It’s our fight with Piedmon back in our own
world. I guess someone took a video.)
“Isn’t that you?”

Uh...Takuma, that video of you has totally
gone viral.
Huh?!

No way! This is crazy! Look at all those
views!

So now people from all over the world have
seen images of Agumon and Piedmon?

That’s it! Awareness! That explains
everything!
Uh...what do you mean?

This world is shaped by the thoughts and
feelings of the people in our world.

So what would happen if lots of people
suddenly became aware of Agumon’s existence?
I...I don’t know, what?

Takuma! I’m feeling this huge rush of power
for some reason!
Me too... I feel like I could do anything!
This is...quite something!

It’s all those people supporting us, cheering
us on, that will end Haruchika’s delusions!

Takuma, his power has weakened, now’s your
chance to finish this!
Got it!
Come on, everyone!
